name: Right in the Hole
description:
Goal

Move the 4 different bars and try to put the ball in the flag hole and increase your win streak record.

Controls

Use WASD keys for moving the up and left bars and use the Arrow keys for moving the bottom and right bars.

Play

You can play this game solo moving all the bars yourself or you can play in coop, one moving the WASD bars the other moving the Arrow keys bars
